bibl.title: Synagogues as 'Houses of Prayer' and 'Holy Places' in the Jewish Communities of Hellenistic and Roman Egypt.
bibl.note: Traduction d'un article en hébreu: A. KASHER, A. OPPENHEIMER and U. RAPPAPORT (Edd.), Synagogues in Antiquity (Jerusalem, 1987) pp. 119-132.

bibl.title: Ancient Synagogues: Historical Analysis and Archaeological Discovery. I

bibl.seg: KASHER Aryeh, Synagogues as 'Houses of Prayer' and 'Holy Places' in the Jewish Communities of Hellenistic and Roman Egypt.
Dan URMAN and Paul V.M. FLESHER (Edd.), Ancient Synagogues: Historical Analysis and Archaeological Discovery. I = Studia Post-Biblica. 47, 1 (Leiden, 1995) pp. 205-220.
Traduction d'un article en hébreu: A. KASHER, A. OPPENHEIMER and U. RAPPAPORT (Edd.), Synagogues in Antiquity (Jerusalem, 1987) pp. 119-132.
